name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-avatar
title: SPFx Avatar
shortDescription: This is a sample web part that helps user create their avatar and save as profile picture. User can even download their avatar as PNG file. This web part can be useful in Intranet to help user create their avatar and save it as profile picture.
longDescription: This is a sample web part that helps user create their avatar and save as profile picture. User can even download their avatar as PNG file. This web part can be useful in Intranet to help user create their avatar and save it as profile picture.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
